note.p: Career: George H Lewes Student; investigated contagious pleuro-pneumonia of cattle; Surgeon in charge of a garrison hospital at Yanina during the Turko-Serbian war; worked in Strasbourg and Leipzig; Professor Superintendent, Brown Institution, London; Professor of Pathology, Cambridge
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 131-136 signed by C S S
